title: Where Dollar Bills Come From
description: Every dollar bill in the world comes from the same paper mill in Massachusetts. Today on the show, we get a front-row seat to the dollar-making process. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Where Dollar Bills Come From
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Imagine being the company that makes all the world's dollar bills. We found that company and took a look inside.
itunes:subtitle: Imagine being the company that makes all the world's dollar bills. We found that company and took a look inside.
